SELECT po.purchase_order_id, po.purchase_order_code, po.purchase_order_status, po.total_amount, po.created_at, po.submitted_at, po.due_date, po.shipped_at,
r.requisition_code,
d.member_id AS drafter_id, d.name AS drafter_name, d.position AS drafter_position, d.email AS drafter_email, d.phone_number AS drafter_contact,
v.vendor_id, v.vendor_name, v.vendor_type, vm.name AS vendor_manager_name, vm.phone_number AS vendor_contact,
w.warehouse_id, w.warehouse_name AS warehouse_name, wm.name AS warehouse_manager_name, wm.phone_number AS warehouse_manager_contact
FROM purchase_order po LEFT JOIN requisition r ON po.requisition_id = r.requisition_id LEFT JOIN member d ON po.created_member_id = d.member_id LEFT JOIN vendor v ON po.vendor_id = v.vendor_id LEFT JOIN member vm ON v.member_id = vm.member_id LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON po.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN member wm ON w.member_id = wm.member_id
WHERE po.purchase_order_id = #{purchaseOrderId}
SELECT pod.product_id, p.product_name, pod.quantity, pod.unit_price FROM purchase_order_detail pod JOIN product p ON pod.product_id = p.product_id WHERE pod.purchase_order_id = #{purchaseOrderId}
